name: Paw Security Service (Turkish)
description:
Türkçeye çevrilmiş versiyonudur. 

Orjinali -> https://remoob.itch.io/paw-security-service

Diğer Oyunlar -> https://remoob.itch.io/

This is the translated version of the original game which you can see here:

  https://remoob.itch.io/paw-security-service 

Hey is that a human using a computer?  Soo cute U_U (Download the game for better performance) Made in 6 days for Cybersecurity Jam. Ali Ege Zabci (zyve) => 2D Artist Arda Karaköz (Sj) => Game Developer Assets: https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/cash-register-sound-effect/ , https://www.chosic.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Loyalty_Freak_Music_-_04_-_Can... and some sound effects from zapsplat.com Hello Mike, This is your new office In Pawama, I hope you like it and save a lot of good cats from cyber threads! -Pawon Furin
